import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List action types"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/workflows/actiontypes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the available workflow action types that can be configured on workflow steps. Action types define the types of automated actions available.

**Note**: This endpoint is part of API version 1.0 which is marked as deprecated.

**Authentication**: Requires authenticated user.

**Use Case**: Get available action types when configuring automated actions for workflow steps.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

types.","properties":{"ItemCount":{"type":"integer","description":"Number of action types returned."},"Items":{"type":"array","description":"Collection of workflow action types.","items":{"type":"object","description":"Defines a type of automated action available in workflows.","properties":{"WorkflowActionTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for this action type."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the action type.","example":"Send Email
